actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to convey the lighthouse located at Ontonagon, Michigan, to the Ontonagon County Historical Society, and for other purposes.
short_title: David L. Corbett Lighthouse Transfer Act

summary.text: David L. Corbett Lighthouse Transfer Act - Directs the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Ontonagon County Historical Society a parcel of land underlying and immediately surrounding the lighthouse at Ontonagon, Michigan. Makes the Secretary responsible for all environmental remediation of such land.

titles.title: David L. Corbett Lighthouse Transfer Act
To direct the Secretary of the Army to convey the lighthouse located at Ontonagon, Michigan, to the Ontonagon County Historical Society, and for other purposes.
